name: Dude, Don't Puke
description:
"I don't know where my head was when I decided to start this party... I mean, just because my father was travelling and all... Oh boy... Here we go."

You must plot your path through the party to try and catch everybody's puke in on go. If you fail, they will destroy your father's carpet!

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2019: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2019
